outputs.output_descr:
Parliament oversight responsibilities enhanced for revenue allocation and and fiscal discipline.
Laws enacted to ensure accountability transparency and participative governance.
Civic education and national dialogues enhanced for the promotion of human rigths.
Swazi law and customs codified for harmonization of governance structures.
Civic education supported for improved rights and capacity to meet states party reporting on International Conventions enhanced.
Local government planning and budgeting Act enacted for optimal usage of resources for enhanced service delivery by 2010.

project_descr: Capacity Building For Democratic Governance and Gender Mainstreaming
